column1: A list of all the white persons resideing on the Estate Williams Delight Situated in
Princes Quarter No 44 the property of seth & Thos Smith, with all the Slaves belonging
to said Estate on thereunto rented VIZ 150 acres

column2: St. Croix December the 12th 1799- total number forty two, Slaves
large & small which we hereby regarding their number specified
quality & age, Testify to be Just-Seth & Thos Smith
